## NativeQuery.setParameters() method

设置多个参数值，数组从下标0开始\|对象以属性名绑定

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  valueArr | unknown\[\] \| object | 值数组\|值对象 |
